entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:15 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
